original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 329.35/50 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 329.35/50 to the US dollar on Tuesday, from 329.15/30 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.85/14.20 percent from 13.90/14.20 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.15/30 percent from 14.35/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.20/35 percent from 14.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.40/50 percent from 14.55/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.20/60 percent, from 14.30/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.25/55 percent. (Colombo/Nov28/2023)
